title: Durable Polyester Flax Friheten Sleeper Sofa Cover Replacement is Compatible for IKEA Friheten Sofa Bed Corner Sectional Slipcover. Sofa Cover Only (Light Beige Right Chaise)
description: Sofa Cover Only! Sofa is not included. This is replacement cover for Friheten Cover Replacement. Please pay attention if the chaise or longer arm is on the left side or on the right when you are sitting in the sofa, not when you are facing the sofa! We only use high quality fabric material for this replacement Friheten cover, and we run a number of tests to make sure that our cover fits well to Friheten sofa, or Friheten sofa bed . The package includes one set of sofa covers. Warning: the covers are design only for Friheten only. Sofa isn’t included! Only sofa cover.
